entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
